snippet.description: This year's ballot features a bevy of superstars who are eligible for the first time. An early look at the voting indicates at least three, and as many as five, former players will get the call for enshrinement. read »

snippet.title: Review: 'The Heat' Passes Bechdel Test, Fails Laugh Test
snippet.description: Box Office Take: Well, if Identity Thief can open to $35 million with basically just McCarthy's face on the poster alongside Jason Bateman (great actor, but not box office), then one would presume that McCarthy and Sandra Bullock should equal at least that much, if not something closer to $50 million. [...] read »

snippet.title: Working With Innovators From Thomas Edison To Steve Jobs, Corning Finds A Glass Fix
snippet.description: Corning has lasted a century and a half through boom and bust yet always comes up with the glass inventors like Thomas Edison or Steve Jobs need to conquer new markets. CEO Wendell Weeks says the company's best days lie ahead. read »

snippet.title: Professor Or Not, Obama Repeatedly Flunks Constitution Law Tests
snippet.description: The President cannot legislate through executive fiat or pick which parts of the law to comply with or decline. read »

snippet.title: Oracle​Voice: Oracle Software Chief Thomas Kurian: 10 Strategic Cloud Computing Insights
snippet.description: (Revolweb) As cloud computing surges into the mainstream of business-technology strategies and deployments, plenty of questions are still swirling around regarding security, time to value, public versus private, lock-in, cost, and more. For businesses, these questions are reasonable as cloud adoptions grow rapidly around the world and increasingly [...] read »

snippet.title: Entrepreneurs Of Austin: Alamo Drafthouse
snippet.description: Sometimes things don’t turn out how we expect them to. Just ask Alamo Drafthouse owner, Tim League. The now film-famous Austin resident started his career with Shell Oil after graduating from Rice University with a degree in mechanical engineering. After quickly realizing oil was not the right path for him, he started to seek exit strategies for [...] read »
